docs.text: [WCraaS] Web Crawler as a Service ¶ About ¶ WCraaS is a fully componetized and modular web crawler that is built on a container-first approach.

docs.text: Architecture ¶ WCraaS uses RabbitMQ as its core communication medium, building on two core patterns: RPC Fanout Components ¶ Control Node URL Cache Cottontail Discovery Node Storage Node MongoDB
